div.p: To the Council of the Acclimatisation Society of Victoria

Letter not found. For the text given here, see the report of the meeting of the Council of the Society held on 26 September 1865 (Age, 27 September 1865, p. 5).
[A letter from Dr. Mueller was read, stating that he had received from Monsieur Ramel, of Paris, the various publications of Monsieur Coste on pisciculture.
It is not known which works by Coste were presented. These books were presented to the society; and, at the suggestion of Dr. Mueller, Monsieur Coste was elected an honorary member of the society, in acknowledgement of the eminent services rendered by him to the art of pisciculture.]
